metadata.dc:description: Presenting a case of nasal Melanoma, in a patient previously diagnosed and treated from Rhabdomyosarcoma of the same nasal cavity. In our Department has been treated with surgery plus thymostimulin (TP-1 Serono) after surgery. Subject reviewed and clinic features, diagnostic difficulties and nowadays immunotherapy commented.
metadata.dc:title: Melanoma de fosa nasal.
[Melanoma of the nasal cavity].
